variant.p: An entity applying this Standard retrospectively in accordance with paragraph C3(b) may also use the practical expedient described in paragraph C5(c), either:

li.p: for all contract modifications that occur before the beginning of the earliest period presented; or
for all contract modifications that occur before the date of initial application.

variant.p: If an entity uses this practical expedient, the entity shall apply the expedient consistently to all contracts and disclose the information required by paragraph C6.
